description: Comprehensive past exam questions with detailed step-by-step solutions covering all AP Physics 1 units. Master key concepts through practice problems from real exams.

topics.name: Unit 1: Kinematics
topics.description: Motion in one and two dimensions, velocity, acceleration, free fall, and projectile motion

topics.name: Unit 2: Dynamics
topics.description: Newton's laws of motion, forces, friction, tension, normal force, and inclined planes

topics.name: Unit 3: Circular Motion & Gravitation
topics.description: Uniform circular motion, centripetal force, gravitational force, and orbital motion

topics.name: Unit 4: Energy
topics.description: Work, kinetic energy, potential energy, conservation of energy, and power

topics.name: Unit 5: Momentum
topics.description: Linear momentum, impulse, conservation of momentum, collisions (elastic and inelastic)

topics.name: Unit 6: Simple Harmonic Motion
topics.description: Springs, pendulums, periodic motion, oscillations, and wave properties

topics.name: Unit 7: Rotational Motion
topics.description: Torque, angular momentum, rotational kinematics, moment of inertia, and rolling motion

topics.name: Unit 8: Fluid Mechanics
topics.description: Pressure, buoyancy, Archimedes' principle, Bernoulli's equation, and fluid flow
